attributes.action: put a stop to the blog mocking the petitions on this website!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
concerned britons nationwide are petitioning the pm in order to improve our standard of living but our efforts are being !!RIDICULED!! by a blog called  But Sir which is copying petitions they think are stupid and putting them on there website

not only is this GRATELY INSULTING but it is A BREECH OF THE DATA PROTECTION ACT as teyare posting PEOPLES NAMES WITH THE PETITIONS!!!!

we the undersigned urge the prime minster to SHUT THIS BLOG DOWN FOREVER.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
